name: Target Shooting Fruit Advance
description:
Target Shooting Fruit Advance is exclusive designed for the lovers of fruit shooting games. Become an expert sniper fruit shooter, by shooting all the stand still & moving watermelon and fruit, using a sniper gun, by playing, the watermelon shoot 3d. Shooting the fruit is real fun and now it’s your turn to become an expert shooter in this watermelon shooting game.
Features
Realistic crushing and smash levels
Aim and smash the fruits
Real shooting at army training camp
Arcade and time attack mode
FPS game play with a lot of weapons
Your Accuracy will be tested in expert levels
